Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails, and address any urgent matters. Review the goals for today.
Continue refining the templates for preliminary financial statements. Ensure all necessary accounts are included and the format is clear and easy to understand.

Begin populating the financial statement templates with sample data to test their functionality and identify any potential issues.
Review the populated financial statements for accuracy and completeness. Identify any errors or discrepancies and investigate their cause.
Update the accounting policies and procedures document based on any lessons learned during the financial statement preparation process. Prepare to leave.
